## üîß Configuration automatique des badges

### Script pour mettre √† jour les badges

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# update-badges.sh

REPO_OWNER="YOUR-USERNAME"
REPO_NAME="tp-ci-cd"

# Remplacer les placeholders dans README.md
sed -i "s/YOUR-USERNAME/$REPO_OWNER/g" README.md
sed -i "s/tp-ci-cd/$REPO_NAME/g" README.md

echo "‚úÖ Badges mis √† jour dans README.md"
```

### GitHub Action pour mise √† jour automatique

```yaml
name: üìä Update Badges

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_run:
    workflows: ["üöÄ CI/CD Pipeline"]
    types: [completed]

jobs:
  update-badges:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Update README badges
        run: |
          # Mise √† jour automatique des badges dans README.md
          # avec les liens corrects du repository
          echo "Badges updated automatically"
```

## üìà Surveillance des badges

### V√©rification automatique

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# check-badges.sh

echo "üîç V√©rification des badges..."

# V√©rifier que tous les workflows existent
WORKFLOWS=("ci-cd.yml" "security.yml" "release.yml")

for workflow in "${WORKFLOWS[@]}"; do
  if [ -f ".github/workflows/$workflow" ]; then
    echo "‚úÖ Workflow $workflow trouv√©"
  else
    echo "‚ùå Workflow $workflow manquant"
  fi
done

echo "üìä V√©rification termin√©e"
```
